context.p: Follow these steps to install RemoteTM Web Server:

step.cmd: Stop the Apache Tomcat or Jetty server if it is running.
Copy RemoteTM.war to the /webapps folder of Apache Tomcat or Jetty.
Delete the /webapps/RemoteTM folder generated by a previous installation if it exists.
Start the Apache Tomcat or Jetty server.
Open the server URL in a web browser with /RemoteTM appended to it (e.g. if the server URL is http://localhost:8080 then open http://localhost:8080/RemoteTM)

Login with these default credentials:
User Name: sysadmin Password: secData
When prompted, enter a new password for sysadmin user.
Modify the sysadmin user and set a real email address.
